Capabilities

  • CAD Designing

    CAD Designing Services, 2D Drafting, 3D Modelling, Rendering, Animation.

  • 3D Printing

    Faster Prototyping with FDM, SLA, SLS, SLM, MJF, Polyjet, DMLS, available in 189 materials.

  • CNC Machining

    CNC Milling (3, 4 and 5 Axis), Turning & Machining Post Processing in 10+ finishes

  • Injection Molding

    Rapid Tooling, Family Molds, Multi-Cavity Models. T1 samples in as fast as 15 days.

  • Sheet Metal Works

    Sheet Metal Stamping, Cutting, Bending, Forming and more. Parts delivered within 1 day.

  • Vaccum Casting

    Production quality parts in just 10 days, even at low volumes. 140+ materials to choose from.
